articles.title: Chris Eubanks surges at Wimbledon: What to know about U.S. player - USA TODAY
articles.description: Not long ago, it seemed like Chris Eubanks' tennis future would be in the broadcast booth. But the Atlanta native is breaking through at Wimbledon.
